TopicTitle: Career friendly mod list out there?

Articles.Content: looking to see what mods currently are career friendly. any lists out there? been looking.. and yep prob in the wrong places.lol

FAR is kinda friendly, it can be a pro or con depending on how you use the game, it means a single solid rocket fuel booster with capsule and parachute goes to space...

Alternis Kerbol again, depending on how you use it...

Kerbal engineer

im sure the others will think of better ones...

AND NOBODY SUGGEST MECHJEB, IT WOULD CORRUPT HIM

I play career and use:

Ambient light adjustment

Chatterer

Deadly reentry

Habitat pack

Kalculator

Kerbulator

Kethane

Notes

SCANsat

Tarsier space telescope

Toolbar

Novapunch

6ssercom

Docking port allignment

Kerbal Alarm Clock

KSPX

KW rocketry

Mechjeb

Remote Tech

Tac life support

TAC self destruct

Targetron

KAS

Dmagic Orbital Science

Final Frontier

Fusebox

Alternate resource panel

Tweakable everything

Wernher checker

Works all great together!

I use SCANSAT and I have to say it is one of the coolest mods I have ever seen. I also have Dmagic which is cool. I'll have to try some of this other stuff tho.

Edited March 20, 2014 by Renaissance0321
I also use KER. I like to use (shameless plug) my own mod parts, which are now Career friendly. See my sig line for those.

You could try using the real solar system with real fuels mod

There is a career progression overhaul mod which brings everything up to "real life"

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/58135-TechTree-0-22-Realistic-Progression-LITE-V0-17a-(Pre-Release-via-TreeEdit)

Edited March 20, 2014 by Rjhere
I think by career-friendly, he means fully integrated in career mode by one way or another (proper technology, location in science tree, ...) and not just "usable in career mode".

I think by career-friendly, he means fully integrated in career mode by one way or another (proper technology, location in science tree, ...) and not just "usable in career mode".

All mods that I listed are integrated in the tech tree (if necessary) and work together in 1 single savegame. Mods like targetron or chatterer don't need that of course.

Currently I'm testing Custom Biomes; hope that I can add that to the list as well.
